## Classes

### <a name="wormhole"></a>`wormhole`

Manage magic-wormhole

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `wormhole` class:

* [`manage_package`](#manage_package)
* [`package_name`](#package_name)
* [`package_ensure`](#package_ensure)
* [`package_provider`](#package_provider)

##### <a name="manage_package"></a>`manage_package`

Data type: `Boolean`

Whether the wormhole package should be managed by the module

Default value: ``true``

##### <a name="package_name"></a>`package_name`

Data type: `String`

Name of the wormhole package

Default value: `'magic-wormhole'`

##### <a name="package_ensure"></a>`package_ensure`

Data type: `String`

Ensure value for the wormhole package resource

Default value: `'installed'`

##### <a name="package_provider"></a>`package_provider`

Data type: `Optional[String]`

Package provider to manage the wormhole package with

Default value: ``undef``

### <a name="wormholepackage"></a>`wormhole::package`

Manage the wormhole package
